website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line backpack that is durable enough to serve you well for years to come.
pros: Boasts a USB 2.1 charging port extended on the side strap of the backpack and a built-in charging cable inside the backpack
Thick, wide shoulder straps with breathable mesh help relieve shoulder pressure
Soft foam padding offers exceptional protection for personal belongings
cons: More expensive than many comparable basketball bags
USB charging port won't work unless it is plugged into a wall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple, keeps your stuff dry
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is durable and very comfortable to wear, holds a lot more than it looks like it will on the outside, and keeps all of your belongings dry, even in a downpour. It also isn't cluttered with a million pockets/compartments inside the main ones like most bags.
customer_reviews.author: Politic

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think but still a good bag.
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems to be well made and packaged. A little smaller than thought. All zippers work smoothly. enough room for a 15" laptop to comfortably fit. The pocket to hold the battery pack is small, only fits a 2700mAh battery. I would have preferred metal "hooks" to secure the ball netting instead of nylon but overall a pretty good bag, 85/100.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Dad

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter in college. She loves it. It has a better shape (less bulky distance behind her) than the usual backpack, and when the power in the school was off (storm damage) for several days, she was able to recharge her cell phone with the battery I added to it. She has not used the anti-theft device, but it looks functional enough.
customer_reviews.author: John F Hazelton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a very cool and snug backpack
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Its a great backpack for the price. Fits snug on my shoulder. I love the water bottle holders on both sides this backpack with come in handing this summer for biking with my girlfriend. The material is strong and business professional looking and is 100% like the picture. Cons: 1 zipper broke off however it was my fault for over stuffing the backpack still a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Erpenbach

customer_reviews.title: It just arrived and it is much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived and it is much better than expected...tons of pockets, seems decent quality material. Comfy, and looks good. Between the pockets, extra loop straps, adjustments, and basketball net (that I'm going to use for carrying my snorkel gear too, this backpack is going to get a lot of use. It looks up to the task
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag to carry Basketball and other stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with this bag, it's large enough for his school books (a couple of 1-in. binders, folders and a small laptop) and holds his basketball securely in place while he rides his bike. It seems to be made of good quality material. He hasn't used the charging port yet, but it's a plus if he needs to.
customer_reviews.author: SMV

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, functional, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack. Especially for the price. Plenty of room and compartments. I like that it has two drink holders and each is tall mesh so it holds my coffee and water well. The strap in front is strong magnet - easy to access and close. I got a bunch of compliments on it walking into work, major upgrade from the raggedy pack I was wearing before. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This bag was bought for my 12 year old son and all of his soccer stuff. It fits everything wonderfully, with room to spare. This bag is better than I could ever imagine, especially for the price. It is very strong and durable material oh, so it seems it will last for a while. My only issue is the bag smells horrible! I had to wash it a few times before use just to get the smell out. So if you can get past the smell and don't mind washing it before you use it, it is a great bag
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Teenager approved!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 17 year old son who is a Senior in high school. He is very picky about everything. He really loves this pack, it does all he needs. From the built in usb to the net for his basketball it is great for him. It is made very well and he is a happy camper with this pack. Plenty of space in the pack and stands up to the demanding life of an active teenager!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: An issue ZIPPERS
customer_reviews.text: Dear kolako, Good day! This is to inform you that the one i bought from you ANTI THEFT BAG (black color)have an issue. My first time to used this product during my travel for hand carry the main zipper broken last Apr,2018.I cannot used it in my combination number. Then on June,2018 another ZIPPER BROKEN I feel so embarrassed and disappointed. Hoping you can solve my problem on this matter. Thank you so much! sincerely, Raffy Ramos Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Raffy Dexter Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, lots of pockets and compartments. Love the structure of the bag and it's hot and cold pocket. I just wish all the zippers were two-way double zipper like on the main compartment of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great and he loves the charging system and the basketball ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my nephew who is 12 and he absolutely loves it. The quality is great and he loves the charging system and the basketball carrying net. He looked at many backpacks on line and this is the one he chose. It so not oversized but offers adequate compartments for all his needs. He is one happy sixth grader!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sport backpack
customer_reviews.text: We will see how this backpack holds up throughout the school year but I have to say this is the most perfect backpack for my daughter. Her phone often dies when she is away at games, so having a built in charger is phenomenal! The net to carry her basketball/volleyball is really fantastic too because she always has one with her.
customer_reviews.author: Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Great secure bag but could be roomier
customer_reviews.text: This bag replaced my HP laptop bag I had for just over 10 years. Impressed with the locks and waterproof zippers. Not quite as much space on the inside as my old bag but still holds my Probook 5650b and a few books with no problems. Front holder for cables is nice but pockets in there seem easy to rip with sharp plugs. Update: So after 6 months, the front pocket has started to tear. Not happy about that and taking a few stars away because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Burns

customer_reviews.title: Okay with some issues
customer_reviews.text: The bookbag looks great and works well. However the material makes it really easy to get dirty. And if you use this for basketball like I do, after a couple of days the bookbag does begin to smell funky. Overall good but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Really nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Much slimmer than it looks yet larger inside than it looks. Doesn't seem to make much sense but it's true. Really a very nice, clean, sharp looking backpack. Has pads in the back and fits very comfortably. It's light weight and really just looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, the outside is a plastic or pvc like material and the inside is very thin plastic fabric. I returned this product and took a $9.xx dollar hit for shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for the laptop reasons and not the netting-for-a-ball reason
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the ability to carry a volleyball, but the netting is very loose with a ball in it. Not secure at all. Great for laptops and even has access so headphones can come out the top of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michigander Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: If it weren't for my clumsiness
customer_reviews.text: Very useful! I have taken this backpack all around a college campus this past summer. It has survived a zoo, the second largest park in the country, and many restaurants; all with a backpack attached! If anything, my clumsiness would have me rating it at a 3 because I knock stuff over all the time from my lack of awareness. But hey! It does it's job, it looks great, and it's so useful!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Works great and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for a high school basketball hopeful to pack her gear AND a basketball. She loves it so I do too! Can you come up with one slightly bigger to hold shoes too??
customer_reviews.author: Mark Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for a trip to Europe. I used the basketball net to carry a blanket and pillow on the plane. The charging cord came in handy when I wanted to charge without carrying my charger in my pocket. I have also carried it for a conference and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: LoriC

customer_reviews.title: High school backpack if you are going to bring a ball
customer_reviews.text: Bad if you are in middle school or elementary in middle school kids don’t have self control and when my kid brang it their with the ball in the net kids constantly slap it and by the fifth day of the week he came home and handed me the part of the bag that hold the ball and the net together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the new upgraded backpack is very good quality, I just wish you could the password ...
customer_reviews.text: the new upgraded backpack is very good quality, I just wish you could the password for the lock. By the way the people password is 000. the company doesn't give you this crucial information
customer_reviews.author: Kyra B.

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for travelers! Camera equipment, storage... FoodOnCars
customer_reviews.text: Great pack. I haul a ton of camera equipment and there are tons of individual pockets and storage options. Fit and finish is excellent. Follow me on Social Media @FoodOnCars Best, Austin
customer_reviews.author: Austin Rexinger

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been holding up well with the heavier backpack load this year. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: chupzilla

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a short time
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the new school year in August and by October one of the straps had broken... He didnt even get to use the basketball holder part, just used it as a regular backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: A little misleading with the basketball on the picture. This backpack is very small. Not recommended for high school kids. Just a laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack! Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Great value. Very well made. Only issue is that the usb didnt work after 2 days of using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING COOL BACKPACK
customer_reviews.text: Okay this backpack is so cool. My brother went nuts over it. He plays sports in school so he LOVES the option of carrying any of the sports balls without losing space inside his backpack! And the charger is a huge PLUS!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana C.

customer_reviews.title: Sad!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back. My zipper broke!! So I didn’t get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Powell

customer_reviews.title: It is an easy fix with either a knot or a few stitches
customer_reviews.text: She loves the backpack. The stitch came out on the black strap. It is an easy fix with either a knot or a few stitches.
customer_reviews.author: g. tom

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't give this to anyone that I liked, spend the money on something better
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy  backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack!! Sturdy and has many storage options! Well worth the money so far. We got the gray and it hides dirt really really well!!
customer_reviews.author: Yellow 11

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice back pack, so far so good, people I work with are thinking about getting some for their kids
customer_reviews.author: carl easley

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is GREAT! Lots of storage and there's so much space! Great quality and excellent padding. I had one before and I had to buy another one for my son and daughter!! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of compliments with this bag. ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments with this bag. The buckle on it broke within a few months but the backpack still does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Basketball net is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Supper comfy. Great backpack. Strong and good storage. Divided well inside. It has a great fatire with net to hold my son’s basketball and this was the main purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Rapaport

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my son bought during basketball seaso ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son bought during basketball seaso and really likes it. He use it at every practice and game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USB Charger Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I just found out that this backpack I purchased for my nephew did not work. I was able to visit him for the first time since it was sent and asked him only to find this out. I tried plugging my phone in to see if he was doing something wrong but it definitely did not work. The bag is nice but the USB does not function. I am super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. My son used for school and it has held up great. No complaints. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great travel backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Used to take my hard hat on flights. Works perfect would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Skinner

customer_reviews.title: The backpack itself is nice but this is the second one I ordered and ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack itself is nice but this is the second one I ordered and the USB/charger does not work (which is one of the main reasons I wanted it). But I just don't have the time to return it again so I fitted it with a portable charger in the slot where the built-in one is and we will just go with that.
customer_reviews.author: DCBRENNANS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BackPack !
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy. I don’t even use all of the storage areas. USB is so convenient: You will use it everyday. Back Straps are close, which keeps the BackPack close to the body, which is ideal. Best purchase of 2019 so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley John Pieczynski

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are NOT durable
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the look of this backpack but after only a few weeks use BOTH zippers have failed and broken off - not sure if this is an anomoly or if this is poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M. Doubert

customer_reviews.title: Roomie
customer_reviews.text: Best pack pack to date, and a cool charging station for a active kid
customer_reviews.author: mayce drmolka

customer_reviews.title: Charger is useless
customer_reviews.text: The charger doesnt charge unless plugged into the wall. Which makes it pointless!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It's good alternative when I am tired carry it with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday. Tried this with my work laptop. It's good alternative when I am tired carry it with my briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Z.

customer_reviews.title: I whsh it was better
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag while it lasted unfortunately it did stop all apart relatively quick I continue to use it even though some of it came apart but once the straps broke I was kind of done
customer_reviews.author: Marqelle Harris

customer_reviews.title: On the small side.
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. A little small for a student who carries books, an I-pad, and athletic equipment. Because of this I would probably not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weide

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for!! The quality is nice and durable, fits my samsung spin 7 15.6" perfectly!! Not really enough room to fit more than 3 notebooks or 3 textbooks at a time though.. But none the less.. Perfect for the laptop and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for college and it’s great. Lots of storage, computer (17.3 in) fits well in it!
customer_reviews.author: tasha pond

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 15 year old son. He LOVES it. Not one to let his phone battery below 70%, this pack is the perfect solution for his portable charger. He loves the ball net feature even more. I love it because it is great quality and was a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect the quality to be this good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the quality to be this good for the price. I haven't used it at all, but just took it out of the protective packaging and am impressed. very good padding, my boo will feel safe keeping his beloved Mac in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking back pack
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking back pack, not a very large bag for shoes or other items, not big enough for high school everyday use for books/binders
customer_reviews.author: J. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Been using it as a computer case for college and it hasn't failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have for this product is that its a bit small. Especially if you want to store your laptop, headphones and books. Feels a bit crampt
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for someone else, hope it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all features.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Love all features and details. Not too big, size is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First bag we bought was defected and seller immediately sent a replacement. Very happy with product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the backpack is not functioning. The charger broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the backpack is not functioning. The charger broke within a few days. The zipper comes undone a couple times a day. Wish I never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag is narrow and compact
customer_reviews.text: Bag is well made lots of compartments and attractive only problem is, it’s unusually narrow. Pictures seem like it’s a standard back pack but it is petite. If need to carry large textbooks or a binder it’s very tight.
customer_reviews.author: NYTricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack and my son loves having the ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack and my son loves having the ability to carry his stuff and his ball, but the charger never worked.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Only one problem he accidentally reset the code with out realizing and not he can use that feature of the back pack I still have not been able to figure it out 😯
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my wife and she loves it! She said it is very roomy, cute, and looks like a designer bag! On top of that it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: pojo1945

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my nephew and he loves it. Well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for any occasion. We loaded up everything we need for the day and off we go.

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: Great design, however one of the zippers is broken and wont close. The lock also gave me some trouble at first. No instructions came with the bag or how to set the code to lock or unlock it I have to figure out how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: CESAR O MELENDEZ

customer_reviews.title: LOGO IS ON THE FRONT
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good backpack but is false advertising because it has the logo right on the front

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for about a year and nothing has broke and the charger is very good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift i think he’ll love it!

customer_reviews.title: Has good quality and looks
customer_reviews.text: Has good quality and looks. comfortable overall. this is the best backpack I have ever had. It is not big enough for text books, but it is perfect for folders and binders as a student.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it on sight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my son as a Christmas gift! He loved it on sight! The versatility and uniqueness of it! So far so good!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Multi-Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I work in security and often have to carry a backpack for various things to help me stay alert and aware but also extra gear I may need such as gloves, eyepro, and many other things. I bought this bag looking for a lighter option than a military bag and use the net for my hardhat. It works perfectly for my purposes and the option of being able to charge my phone discreetly is even better as I am not always near available plugins. Love this bag already!
customer_reviews.author: Ahna

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy another
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Needs a rechargeable battery pack to get the most benifit in charging without outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fox

customer_reviews.title: Needed something more heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: If you are carrying light items (laptop and a book, etc), this is a great backpack and worth the purchase. If you're carrying more than that, I would move on to a more durable backpack. I gave this to my son for Christmas. He's 15 and wanted to use it for school. By the end of January (so about a month of use), the straps tore halfway off and the straps ripped off. He carried his laptop and school books in it, and sometimes his basketball in the outer net too. The features of the backpack are great. Again if you're looking for something to carry lighter items, this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: KOLAKO Basketball Laptop Backpack, Casual Sports Soccer Backpacks, Water Resistant Travel College School Bookbag, Computer Bag for Men Women with USB Charging Port, Fit 17.3 Inch Laptop
product_meta.description:
Color:Bright Black✔Features Constructed
- Hidden Mash Pocket Design: It is stored inside the bottom pouch if you don’t have to use it. You can pull it out to form an extra pocket when needed for ball, lunch bag or helmet.
- Charging USB Port Design: External USB with built-in charging cable offers a convenient charging of your electronic device anywhere. Designed for either Micro-USB or Apple products with a USB 2.0 Port. NOTE:NOT INCLUDE POWER BANK
- Earphone Hole Design: The earphone hole at the top of the backpack is convenient to put through the line into the inner pocket
- 100% Brand New and made of High Density and Water Repellent Polyester Fabric, not easy get wet and ensure long lasting usage. Breathable and Anti Sweat shoulder straps, relax your shoulders and offer Light weight Carrying. Perfects for many occasions: office work, go to college school, business travel, go hiking, go camping and do other outdoor activities, unisex style for both women and men
- Main compartment: very roomy for big items, such as books, clothes, trousers
- Laptop compartment: can place tablet PC and15.6inch laptop
- Front compartment: 1 pockets on the front for phone, pen etc
- Side mesh compartment: suitable for water bottle, compact umbrella etc
